sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CleanupListExportLimitTime</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CleanupListExportLimitTime</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CleanupListExportLimitTime = Class.create();
CleanupListExportLimitTime.prototype = {
    type: 'CleanupListExportLimitTime',

    initialize: function() {
    },

	cleanup: function() {
		var oldest = new GlideDateTime();
		oldest.subtract(1000*3600*24); // 24 hours
		oldest = '' + oldest;

		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_poll');
		gr.addQuery('sys_created_on', '<', oldest);
		gr.query();

		while (gr.next()) {
			gr.deleteRecord();
		}
	},

};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-02-29 01:25:44</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5d05ef47b72002102b695fef7e11a9a0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CleanupListExportLimitTime</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Basic Import/Export Functionality" source="com.glide.import_export">fca638643cb1311068bcf327dfe37fda</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5d05ef47b72002102b695fef7e11a9a0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-29 01:25:44</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
